#summary Console command: import database
#labels console

= Import database =

Import a database to the current one opened. The input file is in [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JSON JSON] format using the [ExportFormat Export format] generated by [ConsoleCommandExport] tool. By default the file is compressed using the GZIP algorithm. The Export/Import commands allow to migrate between engine releases without loosing data.

Use the [ConsoleCommandExport Export] command to generate the JSON file to import.
== Syntax ==
{{{import database <input-file>}}}

Where:

 * input-file    Input file path

== Example ==

{{{
> import database C:\temp\petshop.export
Importing records...
